holidays.title: National Tourism Day
holidays.description: Tourism is observed during National Travel and Tourism Week in the United States.

holidays.title: Beaufort Scale Day
holidays.description: Beaufort Scale Day celebrates the simple yet effective scale that was invented 200 years ago.

holidays.title: Bladder Cancer Awareness Day
holidays.description: With timely medical treatment, patients with bladder cancer have a chance of long-term survival.

holidays.title: International Bereaved Mother's Day
holidays.description: Let us acknowledge, listen, and find intentional ways to help all grieving mums today.

holidays.title: International Dawn Chorus Day
holidays.description: Set your alarm clock because you don’t want to miss the morning sounds of these melodious songbirds.

holidays.title: International Permaculture Day
holidays.description: Today we call upon you to play your part in saving the environment.

holidays.title: Love's Baby Soft Day
holidays.description: Love’s Baby Soft is a fragrance that takes you back to your teens.

holidays.title: Mayday for Mutts
holidays.description: Mayday for Mutts is a national day to spread love and acceptance for mixed breed dogs.

holidays.title: Motorcycle Mass and Blessing of the Bikes Day
holidays.description: Participate in the event and pray for the safe return of every biker on this day.

holidays.title: National Avery Day
holidays.description: Calling all Averys! Step out in style today because it's a special occasion just for you.

holidays.title: National Barrier Awareness Day
holidays.description: We’ll help you reflect on the structures that act as barriers for people with disabilities.

holidays.title: National Cosmopolitan Day
holidays.description: Quench your thirst with a tipple of the Cosmo on National Cosmopolitan Day.

holidays.title: National Homebrew Day
holidays.description: Homebrewing is an art that needs serious tutelage. Let’s show you how to get started.

holidays.title: National Packaging Design Day
holidays.description: National Packaging Design Day celebrates design professionals and the art of package design.

holidays.title: National Paste Up Day
holidays.description: Get your glue sticks and pictures ready to celebrate National Paste-Up Day!

holidays.title: National Roast Leg of Lamb Day
holidays.description: Want to know why this world-famous dish is celebrated? Read on to find out.

holidays.title: Puppy Mill Action Week
holidays.description: Grab your friends and fight to get those furry cuties out of confinement during Puppy Mill Action Week.

holidays.title: World Laughter Day
holidays.description: Make your bonds with people stronger as you laugh together on this day!

holidays.title: J Balvin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This prodigious singer and rapper is taking center stage on the Latin music scene.

holidays.title: MrBeast’s Birthday
holidays.description: This creative genius YouTuber, now nicknamed ‘Youtube Philanthropist,’ has given away at least $1 million.

holidays.title: Rico Nasty’s Birthday
holidays.description: By the end of 2016, Rico Nasty’s hard work paid off, and she was getting noticed.

holidays.title: Sarah Baska’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her amusing content is what keeps her followers coming back for more.
